mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, O.*, P.TITLE, P.MODEL, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.NAME, P.TYPE, P.DATA FROM TB_ORDER O, TB_PRODUCT P WHERE 1=1 AND O.PRODUCT_ID = P.ID AND O.USER_ID = #{userId} AND ROWNUM <= (#{page} + 1) * #{size}) WHERE R > #{page} * #{size}
SELECT O.*, P.TITLE, P.MODEL, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.NAME, P.TYPE, P.DATA FROM TB_ORDER O, TB_PRODUCT P WHERE 1=1 AND O.PRODUCT_ID = P.ID AND O.ID = #{id}
SELECT ID, PRODUCT_ID, USER_ID, FINAL_PRICE, SHOSE_SIZE, QUANTITY, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_NAME, ADDRESS, TEL FROM TB_ORDER WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
